Title: Create Database
DescriptionLines: The database will hold your JSON documents.
If you have more than one server instance in your RavenDB cluster,
then you can set the database replication factor.

Walkthroughs.Title: Create a database operation
DescriptionLines: * Provide an instance of a `DatabaseRecord` object containing the database name (required) and other settings (optional) to the `CreateDatabaseOperation`.
* The database replication factor can be specified when initializing the CreateDatabaseOperation, otherwise the default is 1.

Walkthroughs.Title: Create the database in RavenDB server
DescriptionLines: * Send the _CreateDatabaseOperation_ to the Document Store object for database creation.
* Note: an exception is thrown if the database already exists.
